reviewText: About 50% Aviation Video. They've got this pseudo Army Guy who can't even  keep his ribbons on straight and half the tapes are of him reading  something from a cue card. Most of the aviation footage isn't even from the  wars but taken at airshows of restored planes. If you buy this video like I  did, you'll feel as though you got ripped off. It's put out by  "Columbia River Entertainment Group". They are on my avoid at all  costs list now.
